snippet.title: Mass Effect 2: Official Arrival DLC Trailer
snippet.description:
Prepare for the next DLC chapter, Arrival, in the famous game Mass Effect 2. The Reapers are coming, will Commander Shepard be able to save Earth?

IGN's YouTube is just a taste of our content. Get more:
http://www.ign.com

Want this week's top videos? Sign up:
http://go.ign.com/VideoRound-up
